---
title: "sandbox-payloads.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines a set of utility functions and data structures for creating mock CommonWell API responses. It's primarily used for testing and development purposes, simulating the behavior of the CommonWell Health Alliance API without making actual network requests.

## Code Structure
The code exports several functions and constants that are used to generate mock data for various CommonWell API endpoints. These functions create realistic-looking responses for patient, person, document, and organization-related operations.

## Symbols

### `primaryPersonId`
#### Description
A constant string generated using a custom alphabet for creating unique person IDs.

### `createPatientWithLinks`
#### Description
A function that takes a Patient object and adds mock _links to it, simulating the CommonWell API response structure.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patient | Patient | A Patient object to be enhanced with links |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enhancedPatient | Patient | The input Patient object with added _links |

### `createPatient`
#### Description
Creates a mock Patient object with specified organization and patient details.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| localOrgOID | string | The OID of the local organization |
| localOrgName | string | The name of the local organization |
| patientId | string | The ID of the patient |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patient | Patient | A mock Patient object |

### `createPerson`
#### Description
Creates a mock Person object with specified organization and person details.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| orgId | string | The ID of the organization |
| orgName | string | The name of the organization |
| personId | string | The ID of the person |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| person | Object | A mock Person object |

### `createPatientLink`
#### Description
Creates a mock PatientLink object with specified link details.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patientLink | string | The patient link URL |
| patientId | string | The ID of the patient |
| orgId | string | The ID of the organization |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patientLink | Object | A mock PatientLink object |

### `createDocument`
#### Description
Creates a mock DocumentQueryResponse object with specified organization details.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| orgId | string | The ID of the organization |
| orgName | string | The name of the organization |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| document | DocumentQueryResponse | A mock DocumentQueryResponse object |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| @metriport/commonwell-sdk | Provides types and interfaces for CommonWell API |
| nanoid | Generates unique IDs |
| @metriport/core/util/uuid-v7 | Generates UUIDv7 |

This code is crucial for testing and development of applications that interact with the CommonWell Health Alliance API, allowing developers to work with realistic mock data without making actual API calls.
